I am a passionate researcher with a focus on single-molecule biophysics and computer vision.

My work involves developing novel imaging techniques and computational tools to understand the intricate dynamics of cellular processes at the molecular level. I am always excited to tackle new challenges and collaborate on innovative projects.

papers.title: A Fictitious Paper on Advanced Microscopy.

talks.description: Panel Guest, Women in Banking Breakfast. Sydney, AUS.

miscellaneous: I am an avid photographer and enjoy capturing landscapes and cityscapes.
In my free time, I contribute to open-source scientific software projects.
I also enjoy mentoring students and participating in science outreach programs.

education.degree: Doctor of Philosophy, Genetics, Development, and Diseases
details: Thesis: Single Molecule-Based Computer Vision Analysis of Cortical Actin-Plasma Membrane Protein Interplay

education.degree: Bachelor of Science, Mathematics and Molecular Biology
details: Cum Laude, Collegium V Honors, and Major Honors.

education.institution: Hanoi-Amsterdam High School for the Gifted

getInTouch.text: Feel free to reach out for collaborations, questions, or just to say hello. The best way to contact me is via email.
